data.bulletin: DCR Fire Control is soliciting bids under the PSE01 Public Safety Equipment State Contract for the following Mercedes "Fire Boss" fire hose for the following sizes: 75", 1", 1.5", 1.75". Mercedes Booster Hose. Mercedes 2.5" Hydrant Hose. Mercedes 3" MTSS-800 hose. PSE01 vendors invited to view and respond. Please review and complete attached "Fire Hose Bid Sheet" to be considered for evaluation and award.
data.ship_to_address: Ben Jennell, Fire Warden Bradley Palmer State Park Fire District 5 HQ 40 Asbury Street Topsfield, MA 01983 US Email: ben.jennell@mass.gov Phone: (857) 276-9653
data.bill_to_address: Peter Lewandowski Department of Conservation & Recreation 10 Park Plaza Suite 6620 Boston, MA 02116 US Email: peter.lewandowski@mass.gov Phone: (508) 732-7714
